member.name: T:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract
member.summary: The tesseract OCR engine

member.name: P:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.Version
member.summary: Get the tesseract version

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.#ctor
member.summary: Create a default tesseract engine. Needed to Call Init function to load language files in a later stage.

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode)
member.summary: Create an tesseract OCR engine.
member.param: The datapath must be the name of the parent directory of tessdata and must end in / . Any name after the last / will be stripped.

The language is (usually) an ISO 639-3 string or NULL will default to eng. It is entirely safe (and eventually will be efficient too) to call Init multiple times on the same instance to change language, or just to reset the classifier. The language may be a string of the form [~]%lt;lang>[+[~]<lang>]* indicating that multiple languages are to be loaded. Eg hin+eng will load Hindi and English. Languages may specify internally that they want to be loaded with one or more other languages, so the ~ sign is available to override that. Eg if hin were set to load eng by default, then hin+~eng would force loading only hin. The number of loaded languages is limited only by memory, with the caveat that loading additional languages will impact both speed and accuracy, as there is more work to do to decide on the applicable language, and there is more chance of hallucinating incorrect words.

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode,System.String)
member.summary: Create an tesseract OCR engine.
member.param: The datapath must be the name of the parent directory of tessdata and must end in / . Any name after the last / will be stripped.

The language is (usually) an ISO 639-3 string or NULL will default to eng. It is entirely safe (and eventually will be efficient too) to call Init multiple times on the same instance to change language, or just to reset the classifier. The language may be a string of the form [~]%lt;lang>[+[~]<lang>]* indicating that multiple languages are to be loaded. Eg hin+eng will load Hindi and English. Languages may specify internally that they want to be loaded with one or more other languages, so the ~ sign is available to override that. Eg if hin were set to load eng by default, then hin+~eng would force loading only hin. The number of loaded languages is limited only by memory, with the caveat that loading additional languages will impact both speed and accuracy, as there is more work to do to decide on the applicable language, and there is more chance of hallucinating incorrect words.
This can be used to specify a white list for OCR. e.g. specify "1234567890" to recognize digits only. Note that the white list currently seems to only work with OcrEngineMode.OEM_TESSERACT_ONLY

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.Init(System.String,System.String,Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode)
member.summary: Initialize the OCR engine using the specific dataPath and language name.
member.param: The datapath must be the name of the parent directory of tessdata and must end in / . Any name after the last / will be stripped.

The language is (usually) an ISO 639-3 string or NULL will default to eng. It is entirely safe (and eventually will be efficient too) to call Init multiple times on the same instance to change language, or just to reset the classifier. The language may be a string of the form [~]%lt;lang>[+[~]<lang>]* indicating that multiple languages are to be loaded. Eg hin+eng will load Hindi and English. Languages may specify internally that they want to be loaded with one or more other languages, so the ~ sign is available to override that. Eg if hin were set to load eng by default, then hin+~eng would force loading only hin. The number of loaded languages is limited only by memory, with the caveat that loading additional languages will impact both speed and accuracy, as there is more work to do to decide on the applicable language, and there is more chance of hallucinating incorrect words.

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.DisposeObject
member.summary: Release the unmanaged resource associated with this class

member.summary: Set the image for optical charater recognition
member.typeparam: The color type of the image
member.param: The image where detection took place

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.SetVariable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the variable to the specific value.
member.param: The name of the tesseract variable. e.g. use "tessedit_char_blacklist" to black list characters and ""tessedit_char_whitelist" to white list characters

member.summary: Get all the text in the image
member.returns: All the text in the image

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.GetCharactors
member.summary: Detect all the charactors in the image.
member.returns: All the charactors in the image

member.name: T:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.Charactor
member.summary: This represent a charactor that is detected by the OCR engine

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.Charactor.Text
member.summary: The text

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.Charactor.Cost
member.summary: The cost. The lower it is, the more confident is the result

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.Charactor.Region
member.summary: The region where the charactor is detected.

member.name: T:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.TesseractResult
member.summary: This structure is primary used for PInvoke

member.name: T:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode
member.summary: When Tesseract/Cube is initialized we can choose to instantiate/load/run only the Tesseract part, only the Cube part or both along with the combiner. The preference of which engine to use is stored in tessedit_ocr_engine_mode.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode.OEM_TESSERACT_ONLY
member.summary: Run Tesseract only - fastest

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode.OEM_CUBE_ONLY
member.summary: Run Cube only - better accuracy, but slower

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode.OEM_TESSERACT_CUBE_COMBINED
member.summary: Run both and combine results - best accuracy

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.OcrEngineMode.OEM_DEFAULT
member.summary: Specify this mode to indicate that any of the above modes should be automatically inferred from the variables in the language-specific config, or if not specified in any of the above should be set to the default OEM_TESSERACT_ONLY.
